data.title: HSE will ‘shut sites and issue fines for COVID-19 rule breaches’
data.summary: Employers that do not enforce social distancing measures could have works suspended and face fines, the Health and Safety Executive (HSE) has warned. The safety body, in a joint statement with the Trades Union Congress and Confederation of British Industry, said if it became aware of an employer not enforcing social distancing and similar measures, it would act.
